website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably versatile helmet; you can change its configuration to suit conditions and personal preference.
pros: Lightweight polycarbonate shell with dual-density EPS padding
Can be used as a dual-sport, full-face, or open-face helmet
Heated face shield stays clear in all conditions
cons: Shield seal is occasionally not airtight

customer_reviews.title: 509 Delta R3 Ignite Full Face Snow Helmet with Fidlock (Storm Chaser
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible helmet which is very versatile because the face shield can be removed if one wants to use goggles. I especially love the neck gator. It came promptly and well packaged. But I had to send it back because I needed a carbon fiber helmet just like this and ordered this one which was my error. Anyone would love to have this helmet if they didn't have neck issues and still want to snowmobile. So ordering the carbon fiber one which weighs about two pounds is the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these. The fit is great. The heated shield works though I haven't had a super cold day to really test it yet. The shield itself has a nice glossy outside but the inner layer seems like a different grade of plastic and is very easy to scratch. It's also not the clearest material I've seen for a shield. The built in sunglasses are pretty useless as they capture internal humidity when stowed and are iced over when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ball

customer_reviews.title: Very solid helmet overall
customer_reviews.text: I just took this out riding in single digit weather with a Klim arctic balaclava and it kept me perfectly warm. The only problem I have with this helmet is that the heated shield fogs up almost immediately if it’s not plugged in on a cold day. I also noticed that when I shut the vents the inner drop down visor also iced up and was unusable. I will need to purchase a tinted heated shield ($120) to solve this issue. Overall it’s a very warm, comfortable to wear, and light weight helmet that fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking helmet. I love the heated visor in the font. The yellow shaded lens inside will fog up though! If you measure your head the helmet fits true to the size chart. I have liked this helmet so much thought i have bought two of them! Comes with the wires to connecting the heated shield to the battery also has a spare 3 amp fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zweibohmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This helmet not only looks incredible, the fitment is great too. I dont fmgo off of any helmet sizing chart tho, otherwise id be in a medium. I have always worn an XL. The design is awesome, lines of helmet, the new plug for the heated visor.. its just an amazing helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Colby H

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet. Size runs bigger than Fly. If you wear a large in fly, get the Medium. The wiring was backwards. But one call to 509, and they sent me the correct wiring with no hazel. They are awesome to deal with. Helmet never fogged up and you can ride with sunglasses on and the shied open on nice days. Or put your goggles on with the shield open. Chin strap is a must. Good job 509....
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! And consider buying “like new”. My best decision so far.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet! I went on a 200 mile ride in very cold wore out conditions and never had the helmet fog up. The helmet provides a little more air to the mouth piece even with the vents shut so in really cold weather (-10F or colder) it can be cold wear a thin balaclava and that takes care on that. This helmet also has a wind protector neck piece that drapes down to your jacket. My neck has never been cold wearing this helmet. I hope someone finds value out of this review. Best wishes and ride hard.
customer_reviews.author: Trever

customer_reviews.title: Take note of tinted sheild
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a decent helmet, however, the white comes with a tinted sheild, (in description). wouldn't recommend riding at night with stock sheild.
customer_reviews.author: Bret B.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are one size larger
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet ! Fits good and looks good. If your thinking of buying one I would say do it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meredythe

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet. Color is great. Runs a little big on the size. Normally I am a XL but this one seems a bit bigger. If thay had any left in stock I would have gotten a Large.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Bougie

customer_reviews.title: Nurse Mom that rides
customer_reviews.text: Light. Comfortable. Nice strap system. Inner shield freezes below 10 degrees. Love it otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Nurse mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove. Heated shield is nice.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet works great. The heated shield has never let me down. My old helmet used to always fog.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HELMET
customer_reviews.text: The helmet feels Great. Fits snug and great quality. I cant comment on heat shield or anything as I havent used it outside as of yet. But I'm sure its great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not how it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet fits perfect. Not black and orange like in the picture. I got a grey and orange helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E Stebbing

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret it.....
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for......this helmet is dope, the little things like the breath box and neck curtain are awesome
customer_reviews.author: swash

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Need to have the shield plugged in or the shield cracked or it’ll fog pretty quick. Need to start with the sun shield down or it’ll be fogged up when you go to use it. The magnetic latch system is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 509 helmet and they are great
customer_reviews.author: Robin W Kindred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet and fit exactly as expected. Rode in -3 Fahrenheit and stayed warmer than with my klim balaclava in my old Moto style helmet
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats this helmet
customer_reviews.text: The best helmet out there perfect for snowmobile... very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new lid! This thing keeps my head warm and dual shield don’t fog.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son loves the fit and the looks.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.I.

customer_reviews.title: No replacement for plastic parts.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece that hinges the visor to the helmet broke easily. After months trying to get a replacement part, I still haven’t gotten anything from the manufacturer. If you buy the helmet, you’re stuck with it and $200 poorer.
customer_reviews.author: Roland J Fauvel

customer_reviews.title: Really nice helmet! Very light and fits awesome! 509 needs to change a few things
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet. Love all the features of this helmet. The reason I only gave 3 stars is because it comes with a yellow drop down inner shield and a heated tinted visor. Why not sell the helmet with a clear visor so you can see at night with a tinted drop down shield. Also the shield is not air tight. They need to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A

customer_reviews.title: Heated shield dint work right out of the package
customer_reviews.text: didn't work when I first got it as soon as I would plug the helmet in the fuse would blow. told 509 about it they sent me a new shield and wiring harness. would work for about an hour then blow the fuse again. told them I was still having a problem and they said it was a problem with my sled. but I have other things hooked up on it that I have no problems with fuses blowing so I know their wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Got white in extra large and fits great It comes with the heater cord. I will update again once I go out for a ride and review how well the anti fog on the lens works...
customer_reviews.author: Dino A

customer_reviews.title: fits great but it's still cold
customer_reviews.text: tried out this helmet for the first time with a week of riding in upstate NY. Absolutely love the way it fits and feels, very lightweight and field of vision is great as well. However it is colder than my previous helmets especially if you are a standup rider and are not behind a windshield. I have the updated version but it is still breezy. My other helmets allowed me to keep my baclava under my chin and not over my mouth and nose. Not this one, have to keep it pulled all the way up to the shield and you can still feel the wind. if it's not super cold it's a fantastic helmet. I'll continue to wear it
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

product_meta.title: 509 Delta R3 Ignite Full Face Snow Helmet with Fidlock (Black Ops - Medium)
product_meta.description: Size:Medium| Color:Black OpsFeaturing three configuration options: Dual sport, full face, open face. The R3 2.0 has you covered for all types of snowmobiling and all weather conditions. Featuring a fog blocking heated ITO dual pane electric shield, Orange tinted internal flip down sun visor, removable breathbox & chin curtain this helmet has it all. The R3 2.0 is a DOT/ECE dual safety certified helmet featuring a dual density EPS for maximum impact resistance. The internal liner and cheek pads are removable and washable. Available in sizes XS-2XL. DOT approved. Meets the FMVSS 218 Standard, product also meets requirements imposed by the California Air Resources Board (CARB)
